DOC.brief_summary: This study determine whether medication market indication effective safe treat seborrheic dermatitis face .

DOC.criteria: Stable exacerbate seborrheic dermatitis facial area Psoriasis Atopic dermatitis Facial acne rosacea Dermatophytic skin infection Parkinson 's disease Known immunosuppression ; HIV infection Any condition require continuous systemic topical corticosteroid antimycotic therapy Continuous asthma inhalation treatment require > 800 mg corticosteroid Any severe disease likely interfere conduct plan termination study
